verses.verse: In like manner <S%G3668><s%>, ye wives <S%G1135><s%>, be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to your own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> obey not <S%G544><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, they may <S%G2770><s%> without <S%G427><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> be gained <S%G2770><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the behavior <S%G391><s%> of their wives <S%G1135><s%>;
beholding <S%G2029><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> chaste <S%G53><s%> behavior <S%G391><s%> coupled with <S%G1722><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>.

Whose <S%G3739><s%> adorning <S%G2889><s%> let it <S%G2077><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> the outward <S%G1855><s%> adorning of braiding <S%G1708><s%> the hair <S%G2359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of wearing <S%G4025><s%> jewels of gold <S%G5553><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of putting on <S%G1745><s%> apparel <S%G2440><s%>;

but <S%G235><s%> let it be the hidden <S%G2927><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the incorruptible <S%G862><s%> apparel of a meek <S%G4239><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> quiet <S%G2272><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> of great price <S%G4185><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> after this manner <S%G3779><s%> aforetime <S%G4218><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who hoped <S%G1679><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, adorned <S%G2885><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, being in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>:

as <S%G5613><s%> Sarah <S%G4564><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>, calling <S%G2564><s%> him <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>: whose <S%G3739><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> ye now are <S%G1096><s%>, if ye do well <S%G15><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> put in fear <S%G5399><s%> by any <S%G3367><s%> terror <S%G4423><s%>.

Ye husbands <S%G435><s%>, in like manner <S%G3668><s%>, dwell with <S%G4924><s%> your wives according to <S%G2596><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, giving <S%G632><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> unto the woman <S%G1134><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto the weaker <S%G772><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> being also joint-heirs <S%G4789><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>; to the end that <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> be <S%G1581><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> hindered <S%G1581><s%>.
Finally <S%G5056><s%>, be ye all <S%G3956><s%> likeminded <S%G3675><s%>, compassionate <S%G4835><s%>, loving as brethren <S%G5361><s%>, tenderhearted <S%G2155><s%>, humbleminded <S%G5391><s%>:

not <S%G3361><s%> rendering <S%G591><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for <S%G473><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> reviling <S%G3059><s%> for <S%G473><s%> reviling <S%G3059><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> blessing <S%G2127><s%>; for1492, 3754 hereunto1519, 5124 were <S%G2564><s%> ye called <S%G2564><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> ye should inherit <S%G2816><s%> a blessing <S%G2129><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%>, He that would <S%G2309><s%> love <S%G25><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> good <S%G18><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, Let him refrain <S%G3973><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> from <S%G575><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lips <S%G5491><s%> that they speak <S%G2980><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%>:

And let him turn away <S%G1578><s%> from <S%G575><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G18><s%>; Let him seek <S%G2212><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pursue <S%G1377><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> are upon <S%G1909><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%>: But <S%G1161><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is upon <S%G1909><s%> them that do <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is he that will harm <S%G2559><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> ye be <S%G1096><s%> zealous <S%G3402><s%> of that which is good <S%G18><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye should suffer <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>' sake, blessed <S%G3107><s%> are ye <S%G1161><s%>: and <S%G5399><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> be troubled <S%G5015><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> sanctify <S%G37><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> Christ <S%G2962><s%> as Lord <S%G2962><s%>: <S%G1161><s%> being ready <S%G2092><s%> always <S%G104><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> give answer <S%G627><s%> to every man <S%G3956><s%> that asketh <S%G154><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> a reason <S%G3056><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, yet with <S%G3326><s%> meekness <S%G4240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>:

having <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, wherein3739, 1722 ye <S%G5216><s%> are spoken against <S%G2635><s%>, 5613, 2555 they may be put to shame <S%G2617><s%> who revile <S%G1908><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> manner of life <S%G391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is better <S%G2909><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should so <S%G2309><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>, that ye suffer <S%G3958><s%> for well-doing <S%G2228><s%> than for evil-doing <S%G2554><s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also2532, 3958 suffered <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> once <S%G530><s%>, the righteous <S%G1342><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> the unrighteous <S%G94><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might bring <S%G4317><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>; being put to death <S%G2289><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> made alive <S%G2227><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%>;
in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> and preached <S%G2784><s%> unto the spirits <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>,

that aforetime <S%G4218><s%> were disobedient <S%G544><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G530><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> waited <S%G1551><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noah <S%G3575><s%>, while the ark <S%G2787><s%> was a preparing <S%G2680><s%>, wherein1519, 3739 few <S%G3641><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, eight <S%G3638><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>, were saved <S%G1295><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>:

which <S%G3739><s%> also after a true likeness <S%G499><s%> doth <S%G4982><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> you <S%G2248><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> the putting away <S%G595><s%> of the filth <S%G4509><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the interrogation <S%G1906><s%> of a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, having gone <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; angels <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> authorities <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%> being made subject <S%G5293><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.
